text:
2. You can use the style tab. Create two set of choice fields and use clases to handle the alignment of the text.
`{{ "text-" ~ module.style.text_alignment }}`
`{{ "xs-text-" ~ module.style.xs_text_alignment }}`
(assuming `left` , `center` and `right` )
Good morning Gonzalo, thank you so much for the response
and in regards to adding new breakpoints, do you have any advice ?
